label: conformityCertificate
comment: A reference to the human / printable version of this conformity attestation - typically represented as a PDF document. The document may have more details than are represented in the digital attestation.

rangeIncludes.comment: A file representing a data snapshot that is used to infomr the conformity assessment.

domainIncludes.comment: A conformity attestation issued by a competent body that defines one or more assessments (eg carbon intensity) about a product (eg batttery) against a specification (eg LCA method) defined in a standard or regulation.
